Megatron Revived:
 
The Emperor clone was able to dodge the blast, diving to safety behind rocks.  He then went and recovered his weaponry; shield, sword, and fusion cannon.  Shaking the cobwebs free from his head, he ventured back to the pilot.  Upon reaching her, he extended his left hand, a sign of diplomacy.
"I see you too have recently arrived here.  I am Megatron Revived, that femme over there is my step sister Organics.  The other I do not know, a Maximal I suppose.  What are you doing here, if you do not mind my inquiry."

Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
The craft crashed downward against the rocks, and
Fortuneteller was shaken, but knew what she had to do.
"It will sound perfect, the crash severed a fuel
line, causing an explosion."  She had been careful to
make sure that she had no Deviner symbols on herself,
or in the shuttle, but the technology might be
different enough to hint at an unknown faction, rather
than an un-allied transformer, and she couldn't allow
that.

Her DNA scanners raced out, quickly giving her the
form of a nearby sparrow.  She then set the
self-destruct to fifteen seconds, and grabbed her
bolts, staff, and communicator, the one item of
Deviner technology she was allowed to have.  She
plunged it into a compartment in her chest, and popped
the cockpit open.

Racing out she shouted, "GET DOWN!"  and leaped behind
a rock, as the ship exploded, not a huge explosion,
but enough to ensure there was nothing identifiable.
